name: AUNS Rick and Morty Browser (PC/Laptop)
description:
AUNS Rick and Morty is here!

Play in the browser for free with no installs required (PC or Laptop). This is the Beta version of our Game. Updated version with crypto/NFT rewards, PVP mode and more characters coming soon! Will be released on iOS, Android, Windows and Apple/Linux.

The game is 100% free to play with no data tracking or ads! NFTs are totally optional! Hope you enjoy and have fun! :)

Known issues/bugs to fix:

- Rick glitching when aiming

- Rick  sometimes resetting to starting position after shooting

Disclaimer: This is not an official Rick and Morty game made by Adult Swim. Just some Rick and Morty fans making a fun game while implementing web3 tech and NFTs to make it decentralized and ad free! Please reach out to aunseco@gmail.com with questions or concerns!
